ai-atk-abh02a5:499_2: Herein, a condition for the wholesome root: this is what is meant.
ai-atk-abh02a5:499_3: Because what is skillful and unskillful, its root, and the practice that leads to the unskillful.
ai-atk-abh02a5:499_4: But in the case of the opposite sex only one can be impediments,
ai-atk-abh02a5:499_5: That is why the condition is really in terms of the various kinds of becoming .
ai-atk-abh02a5:499_6: Which is its root? Do they say, “What is their root?” But what is their root? After confinement, they are unreal.”
ai-atk-abh02a5:500_0: Through ignorance and its root items, in that place there is a starting point, like the first place in the second place,
ai-atk-abh02a5:500_1: (but) having shown that (of the First Seyyas),
ai-atk-abh02a5:500_2: Therefore one root item should be understood in four ways: in the result of the unprofitable root, and all with the rooted in the skillful.
ai-atk-abh02a5:500_3: Those who are skilled in the hymns, etc., have nothing foundations because of the profitable activity, etc., as conditioned phenomena, since they don’t get the noble ones.
ai-atk-abh02a5:503_0: Virtue as a result for wholesome and results,
ai-atk-abh02a5:504_0: Again, of the same opposite sex,
ai-atk-abh02a5:505_0: to break up the fetters and to break up the fetters.
ai-atk-abh02a5:507_0: Because no knowledge of the arrival at each is not found in them.
ai-atk-abh02a5:508_0: The Wise One, whose attainment is endless, who is the Wise One,
ai-atk-abh02a5:509_0: Herein, there is no more to do.
ai-atk-abh02a5:510_0: But this discourse in the texts on responsible to the two brothers by the people who were brothers by means of the teachings bringing them to the two brothers and then shows them to the one who has shown them.
ai-atk-abh02a5:513_0: The Analysis of conditional origination is finished.
